title: Woman Detective

nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
A detective who follows a trail
The Mickey Mouse universe is a fictional universe in which the Disney cartoon character Mickey Mouse lives.
Police officer who looks for evidence.
A police officer who investigates crimes

Skill level in the Purble Place game. Once a Purble Place game is completed, a player gets a skill level rank assigned automatically by the game (based on number of guesses and hints during the game).
A person who investigates crimes, can be a rank and job in a police department, state or federal employee, or a civilian called a private detective
Investigator, either a member of a police agency or a private person
A police officer who looks for evidence as part of solving a crime; an investigator.
A detective is an investigator, usually a member of a law enforcement agency.
Someone who investigates by carefully analyzing each clue.

description: The female version of the üïµ Sleuth or Spy emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman detective emoji is depicted with a keen and focused expression, exuding an aura of intelligence and determination. She wears a classic trench coat, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading that suggests a realistic fabric texture. Her posture is poised and observant, often holding a magnifying glass, symbolizing investigation, mystery, and the pursuit of truth in digital conversations.
